description:
Names, Objects, and Plummeting From The Cliff

Presented by Brandon Craig Rhodes

The assignment statement is often the second thing a new Python
programmer learns, right after the "print" statement - but the beginner
can get seriously bogged down in all of the concepts that assignment
involves! Using a simple analogy, this talk will tackle those issues
head-on.
title: PyOhio 2011: Names, Objects, and Plummeting From The Cliff
